akn:content.akn:p: The Office may provide for a process of prequalification for private entities to submit a bid pursuant to ยง 2-273.03. The process shall include public notice of a request for qualifications, including the requirements and the criteria the Office will use in determining whether the private entity prequalifies.

In order to be prequalified to submit a bid pursuant to ยง 2-273.03, a private entity shall, in addition to any requirements set forth in the request for proposals for a public-private partnership project:
If the Office determines that a prequalification process is appropriate for the public-private partnership project, only prequalified private entities may be a proposer.

The Office may charge a reasonable application fee for prequalification that may not exceed the Office's actual direct cost of evaluating the application and which shall be deposited into the Fund established by ยง 2-272.04.
